A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is as bad as the force awakens. There's only 3 plot lines\, and the only plot line that is worth while is Rey & Kylo. The humor is misfired and sucks. The script and dialogue blow. And I got tired of hearing how trigger happy of a pilot Po is. I cant get the 2.5 hours of my life back and have lost any excitement for Disney's Star Wars movies.
